languages.text: Это существо ведет бой из идеальной позиции. Пока в радиусе 2 клеток вокруг него нет противника, оно получает +100% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells around, it has +100% damage, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g}.

languages.text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо ведет бой из идеальной позиции. languages.text: Esta criatura está en la posición ideal para el combate. Si no hay enemigos a 2 casillas, gana +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura está en la posición ideal para el combate. Si no hay enemigos a 2 casillas, gana +100 % de daño, +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物已经找到了最合适的战斗位置。如果2格内没有任何敌人，此生物造成的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}提高{/g}100%，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}提高50%。
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物已经找到了最合适的战斗位置。如果2格内没有任何敌人，此生物造成的伤害提高100%，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}提高50%。

languages.text: この生物は戦うのに最適な場所を見つけた。2セル以内に敵がいない場合、+100%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、 +50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は戦うのに最適な場所を見つけた。２セル以内に敵がいない場合、+100%のダメージ、 +50%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ドッジ{/g}、+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur hat die perfekte Kampfposition gefunden. Sofern sich innerhalb einer 2-Felder-Radius keine Feinde befinden, erlangt sie +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur hat die perfekte Kampfposition gefunden. Sofern sich innerhalb einer 2-Felder-Radius keine Feinde befinden, erlangt sie +100 % Schaden, +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}.

languages.text: Cette créature a trouvé la position idéale pour combattre. En l'absence d'ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases, elle bénéficie de +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +50 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature found the perfect position to fight. If there are no enemies within 2 cells, it gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature a trouvé la position idéale pour combattre. En l'absence d'ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases, elle bénéficie de +100 % de dégâts, +50 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g}.
